question: [File: aptos-core/storage/jellyfish-merkle/src/iterator/mod.rs] [Function: JellyfishMerkleIterator::cleanup_stack()] [Incorrect pop logic] At lines 196-203, the function pops nodes until finding one that's not rightmost - can an attacker craft a tree where all nodes are marked rightmost, causing the entire stack to be cleared prematurely?
